overview:
Henry is the founder and CEO of Movoto. Henry is a passionate real estate broker, serving clients in the San Francisco Bay Area, and have been involved in numerous transactions involving both sellers, buyers, and relocation referrals. He has also been active in bringing innovations to the real estate industry through Movoto. Henry started Movoto because he was a frustrated homebuyer, and thought that he could improve the consumer experience in purchasing a home. Prior to founding Movoto, he co-founded MediSpark, which was acquired by iScribe and then Caremark, as well as Cranite Systems, a wireless security software company. Henry has also held a number of business and product management positions at Applied Materials and FormFactor. Henry holds Master of Science degrees in both management and in engineering from Stanford University, and a Bachelorâ€™s degree in electrical engineering from Purdue University.

http://www.movoto.com
